p: A log-probit regression model for the three oils was obtained and toxicity was reported as lethal concentrations LC 50 and LC 90, representing the concentration in ppm necessary to cause 50% and 90% larval mortality, respectively, in 24 h. The larvicidal mortality was corrected by Abbott’s formula [ 1] and an LC 50, LC 90 regression equation, and the 95% confidence limit was calculated by using probit analysis [ 17]. Probit analysis was performed by using the software by Dr. Alpha Raj. M “Free LD 50/LC 50 Calculator (2018 web version)” based on the Probit Analysis method of Finney [ 16].
